name: AdvancedProjectile
shortDescription: Control how a projectile moves including speed, acceleration, distance, and lifetime.
description: Control how a projectile moves including speed, acceleration, distance, and lifetime.
- To simulate a rocket, use a starting speed of 0 and a positive acceleration (max speed may also be used)
- To simulate a hand grenade, use a high starting speed, a negative acceleration, and a non-zero lifetime
- If the object is not moving, acceleration will be towards the direction it is facing
- If the object is moving, acceleration will be in the direction the object is moving

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Control how a projectile object moves including lifetime, distance, speed, and acceleration.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: AdvancedProjectile

events.comment: Record starting position so Max distance can be calculated
Save the speed and angle the object is moving (and then stop the object)
If stopped, move in direction the object is facing
If moving, move in direction the object is facing
Save the speed the object is moving
If stopped, move in direction the object is facing
If moving, move in direction the object is facin
Stop the object if it is moving away from object angle.  Required for min speed to work.

eventsFunctions.description: Check if max distance from starting position has been exceeded (object will be deleted next frame).
eventsFunctions.fullName: Max distance from starting position has been exceeded
eventsFunctions.name: IsMaxDistanceExceeded
eventsFunctions.sentence: Max distance from starting position of _PARAM0_ has been exceeded

eventsFunctions.description: Check if lifetime has been exceeded (object will be deleted next frame).
eventsFunctions.name: IsLifetimeExceeded

eventsFunctions.description: the lifetime of the object. Object is deleted after property has been exceeded. Use "0" to ignore this property.
eventsFunctions.name: MaxLifetime

eventsFunctions.description: the max distance from starting position of the object. Object is deleted after property has been exceeded. Use "0" to ignore this property.
eventsFunctions.name: MaxDistanceFromStart
eventsFunctions.sentence: the max distance from starting position

eventsFunctions.description: Change the starting position of object to it's current position.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Change starting position to the current position
eventsFunctions.name: SetStartingPositionToCurrentPosition
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the starting position of _PARAM0_ to it's current position

eventsFunctions.description: the max speed of the object. Object forces cannot exceed this value. Use "0" to ignore this property.
eventsFunctions.name: MaxSpeed

eventsFunctions.description: the minSpeed of the object. Object forces cannot go below this value. Use "0" to ignore this property.
eventsFunctions.name: MinSpeed

eventsFunctions.description: the acceleration of the object. Use a negative number to slow down.
eventsFunctions.name: Acceleration

eventsFunctions.description: the starting speed of the object. Object will move in the direction it is facing when it is created. Use "0" to ignore this property.
eventsFunctions.name: StartingSpeed

eventsFunctions.description: Check if automatic deletion is enabled when lifetime is exceeded.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Automatic deletion is enabled when lifetime is exceeded
eventsFunctions.name: DeleteWhenLifetimeExceeded
eventsFunctions.sentence: Automatic deletion is enabled when lifetime is exceeded on _PARAM0_

eventsFunctions.description: Change automatic deletion of object when lifetime is exceeded.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Change automatic deletion when lifetime is exceeded
eventsFunctions.name: SetDeleteWhenLifetimeExceeded
eventsFunctions.sentence: Enable automatic deletion of _PARAM0_  when lifetime is exceeded: _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Check if automatic deletion is enabled when distance from starting position is exceeded.

eventsFunctions.name: DeleteWhenDistanceExceeded
eventsFunctions.sentence: Automatic deletion is enabled when distance from starting position is exceeded on _PARAM0_

eventsFunctions.description: Change automatic deletion when distance from starting position is exceeded.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Change automatic deletion when distance from starting position is exceeded
eventsFunctions.name: SetDeleteWhenDistanceExceeded
eventsFunctions.sentence: Enable automatic deletion of _PARAM0_ when distance from starting position is exceeded: _PARAM2_

propertyDescriptors.label: Max speed
propertyDescriptors.description: Speed from object forces will not exceed this value. Use "0" to ignore this property.
propertyDescriptors.name: MaxSpeed

propertyDescriptors.description: Speed from object forces will not go below this value. Use "0" to ignore this property.
propertyDescriptors.name: MinSpeed

propertyDescriptors.label: Acceleration
propertyDescriptors.description: Negative acceleration can be used to stop a projectile.
propertyDescriptors.name: Acceleration

propertyDescriptors.label: Starting speed
propertyDescriptors.description: Object will move in the direction it is facing when it is created. Use "0" to ignore this property.
